subject: Elevators and Escalators
Accidents and Safety
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Seven people were injured at Giants Stadium in East Rutherford, N.J., on Saturday night when an escalator crowded with fans exiting the stadium malfunctioned after the Patriots-Giants game, police said.
snippet: Seven people were injured at Giants Stadium in East Rutherford, N.J., on Saturday night when an escalator crowded with fans exiting the stadium malfunctioned after the Patriots-Giants game, police said.
